subject: Order confirmation
description_text:
Hello i am just making sure my order went through. i never got an email or text confirmation. 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Preed2014,    We have received your order, SSN4458. We will process it shortly, and shipping is expected to begin on December 15th.

can you please give me the tracing number for this item


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi Preed2014,  If you ordered the H-pattern and sequential 2-in-1 shifter, the shipment has been delayed and is scheduled to be dispatched on the 20-23th. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
